text: Vexillology is the second studio album by Canadian electronica producer, deadmau5. Vexillology was released on November 6, 2006. The album is only of two of deadmau5's album that do not feature his signature "mau5head" on the cover art. The name of the album is from the study of flags and their symbols. (Vexillology) ==Songs== ==Other websites== *Vexillology at Discogs Category:2006 albums Category:Deadmau5 albums
title: Vexillology (album)
